trans-unit.source: A standard endpoint that is used by services to send announcement messages.
trans-unit.target: 由服务用于发送公告消息的标准终结点。

trans-unit.source: This class represents an endpoint that has a fixed contract so when you create announcement endpoints you only specify the binding and the address.
trans-unit.target: 此类表示一个终结点，该终结点具有固定协定，因此当您创建公告终结点时，只能指定绑定和地址。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.AnnouncementEndpoint> supports two discovery protocols versions: WS-Discovery April 2005 and WS-Discovery July 2008.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.AnnouncementEndpoint> 支持两个发现协议版本：WS-Discovery 2005 年 4 月版和 WS-Discovery 2008 年 7 月版。

trans-unit.source: Any instance of the endpoint supports only one of these versions.
trans-unit.target: 任何终结点实例都只支持其中的一个版本。

trans-unit.source: You choose which version is supported by the endpoint by providing the `discoveryVersion` parameter to the appropriate `AnnouncementEndpoint` constructor.
trans-unit.target: 你选择提供终结点支持哪些版本`discoveryVersion`到适当的参数`AnnouncementEndpoint`构造函数。

trans-unit.source: The default discovery version is WS-Discovery April 2005.
trans-unit.target: 默认的发现版本是 WS-Discovery 2005 年 4 月版。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.AnnouncementClient> uses <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.AnnouncementEndpoint> to send announcements.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.AnnouncementClient> 使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.AnnouncementEndpoint> 发送公告。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.AnnouncementService> and all classes derived from it use <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.AnnouncementEndpoint> to listen for announcements.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.AnnouncementService> 以及所有从它派生的类都使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.AnnouncementEndpoint> 侦听公告。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.AnnouncementEndpoint" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 创建 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.AnnouncementEndpoint" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.AnnouncementEndpoint" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 创建 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.AnnouncementEndpoint" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The discovery version to use.
trans-unit.target: 要使用的发现版本。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.AnnouncementEndpoint" /> class that supports the specified <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion" />.
trans-unit.target: 创建支持指定的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.AnnouncementEndpoint" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpoint> supports two discovery protocols versions: WS-Discovery April 2005 and WS-Discovery July 2008.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpoint> 支持两个发现协议版本：WS-Discovery 2005 年 4 月版和 WS-Discovery 2008 年 7 月版。

trans-unit.source: The version supported by a specific instance is specified by this or any constructor that takes a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 特定实例支持的版本由此构造函数或任何采用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion> 参数的构造函数指定的。

trans-unit.source: The binding.
trans-unit.target: 绑定。

trans-unit.source: The address.
trans-unit.target: 地址。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.AnnouncementEndpoint" /> class with the specified binding and address.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的绑定和地址创建 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.AnnouncementEndpoint" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The discovery version to use.
trans-unit.target: 要使用的发现版本。

trans-unit.source: The binding to use.
trans-unit.target: 要使用的绑定。

trans-unit.source: The address of the endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 终结点的地址。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.AnnouncementEndpoint" /> class that supports the specified <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion" /> with the specified binding and address.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的绑定和地址创建 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.AnnouncementEndpoint" /> 类的新实例，该实例支持指定的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion" />。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpoint> supports two discovery protocols versions: WS-Discovery April 2005 and WS-Discovery July 2008.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpoint> 支持两个发现协议版本：WS-Discovery 2005 年 4 月版和 WS-Discovery 2008 年 7 月版。

trans-unit.source: The version supported by a specific instance is specified by this or any constructor that takes a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 特定实例支持的版本由此构造函数或任何采用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion> 参数的构造函数指定的。

trans-unit.source: Gets the discovery version this announcement endpoint supports.
trans-unit.target: 获取此公告终结点支持的发现版本。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion" /> 实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum announcement delay.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置最大公告延迟。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> instance that contains the maximum announcement delay.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> 实例，其中包含最大公告延迟。

trans-unit.source: This value is a <xref:System.TimeSpan> that specifies a small, random delay to prevent network storms when a network goes out and all services come back online at the same time.
trans-unit.target: 此值为 <xref:System.TimeSpan>，它指定随机的短时间延迟，以防止在网络出现故障后所有服务同时重新联机所造成的网络风暴。

trans-unit.source: See the [WS-Discovery April 2005 specification](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=127029) section 2.4 Protocol Assignments for more details.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅[Ws-discovery 2005 年 4 月规范](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=127029)部分 2.4 协议分配更多详细信息。
